## ğŸ—ï¸ Architecture Alignment

### Zero-Configuration Principle
- [ ] âœ… No configuration files added
- [ ] âœ… No environment variables required
- [ ] âœ… Works out of the box
- [ ] âœ… Auto-discovery maintained

### Zero-Dependency Principle
- [ ] âœ… No npm packages added
- [ ] âœ… Pure vanilla JavaScript
- [ ] âœ… No build tools required
- [ ] âœ… No bundlers introduced

### Hot-Reload Integrity
- [ ] âœ… State preservation maintained
- [ ] âœ… Incremental updates functional
- [ ] âœ… GitHub API integration intact
- [ ] âœ… Rotation continuity preserved

## ğŸ“ Code Quality Checklist

**Standards Compliance:**
- [ ] Follows enterprise-grade naming conventions
- [ ] Includes comprehensive comments
- [ ] Self-documenting code structure
- [ ] Proper error handling implemented
- [ ] Console logging for debugging
- [ ] No cryptic variable names (no `x`, `y`, `foo`)

**Documentation:**
- [ ] README updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Inline comments added
- [ ] CONTRIBUTING.md consulted
- [ ] CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md respected

**Best Practices:**
- [ ] Code is DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself)
- [ ] Functions are SOLID (well, as SOLID as vanilla JS gets)
- [ ] No hardcoded values (except the intentional ones)
- [ ] Graceful degradation on errors
